Key Match Events: South Africa won by 3 wickets (with 5 balls remaining) (DLS method)
Pre-Game Insights: West Indies and South Africa face off in virtual quarter-final at T20 World Cup
Shai Hope wants West Indies to keep playing the way they did against USA with the knockouts in sight
South Africa want to make amends for their semi-final exit seven months ago at the ODI World Cup, says Keshav Maharaj
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tickets still available for the crunch game
The co-hosts were unbeaten through the group stage too
South Africa boast a perfect record, six out of six wins
Rain may be the biggest concern for the teams with the forecast not great during the day on Sunday, but the precipitation probability decreases to 17% in the evening
Nicholas Pooran is the tournament's top run-scorer at the moment with 227 runs; Quinton de Kock is in third place, 40 runs behind
Others: Alzarri Joseph has the same number of tournament wickets as Anrich Nortje - 11 - at a slightly higher average (13.81 compared to 12.90) but a slightly better strike rate
Marco Jansen has flown under the radar despite being an important part of South Africa's progress
West Indies have choices to make in their team selection, whether to include an extra seamer in Romario Shepherd or stick to the offspin of Roston Chase
South Africa may consider two spinners and left Baartman out, and may consider that combination again
